metadata.title: CVE-2016-3956 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The CLI in npm before 2.15.1 and 3.x before 3.8.3, as used in Node.js 0.10before 0.10.44, 0.12 before 0.12.13, 4 before 4.4.2, and 5 before 5.10.0,includes bearer tokens with arbitrary requests, which allows remote HTTPservers to obtain sensitive information by reading Authorization headers.

criterions.comment: npm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
